title: FS - 1909 W.M. Dick Co. PC Segments
author: MartyFromCANADA

posts.post_title: FS - 1909 W.M. Dick Co. PC Segments
posts.post_content:
These cards are actually hand cut segments of a 1909 Pirates folding post card. A chance to own a unique part of a rare postcard. The cards are uncatalogued in this state, but have been deemed authentic by SGC. I know this won't be everyone's "cup of tea", but I purchased a PC that was literally falling a part. Thought this would be a good way to preserve what was left. Ideal for player collectors. The cards I have left for sale are;

Fred Clarke 220
Vick Willis 220
Babe Adams 200 
Tommy Leach 200
Howie Camnitz 120
Nick Maddox 120
Lefty Leifield 120
Bill Abstein 120 
Bobby Byrne 120
Ham Hyatt 120
Chief Wilson 120

Paypal f&f only.(Shipped) PM if interested.
